mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_attachment_refer where exists(select * from ujcms_attachment t where t.id_ = ujcms_attachment_refer.attachment_id_ and t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_attachment_refer (id_, attachment_id_, refer_type_, refer_id_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attachmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{referType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
